bibl.title: Coinage as ‘Code’ in Ptolemaic Egypt.
William V. HARRIS (Ed.) The Monetary Systems of the Greeks and Romans
bibl.author: MANNING, Joseph G.

bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. History of 'money' in Egypt. - 3. The Ptolemaic economy. - 4. Coin as 'code' in Ptolemaic Egypt. - 5. Money and the Ptolemaic state. - 6. Egyptian practice. -7. Conclusions.
MANNING Joseph G., Coinage as ‘Code’ in Ptolemaic Egypt.
William V. HARRIS (Ed.) The Monetary Systems of the Greeks and Romans (Oxford, 2008) pp. 84-111.
